Now don't get too excited if you're looking to purchase this game.  It's absolutely false advertising.  Not even once, do you get to kill a floor in this game. Not once!.  However, if by fluke or purpose, it turned out to be a very pleasing co-op survival horror game!  

Killing Floor is a very typical survival horror game in which you fight off waves of increasingly difficult, zombie-like monsters, to ultimately reach the last wave and battle a boss.  Surprisingly enough, this game can run on some of the most low-end basic computer set-ups around without much of an issue, and the graphics are fairly good.  The controls and the gameplay are really fun, however the UI and the voice acting of the Trader in the game could certainly benefit from a overhaul (although I think the voice acting was intentional).

That said, I do not recommend that anyone purchase this game after this review has been posted, due to the fact that the sequel is on the way and the servers for this game are already beginning to die.  There are plenty of servers to connect to with OK ping here in the eastern US, but I have noticed that the number of players is dropping significantly since the game was released, which spells disaster for the servers in the future, even more so considering that sequel is nearing release this year.

If this game goes on sale from here on out and you're interested, pick it up for sure, otherwise, look into the sequel instead.

8/10.

Played this game's pirate version five years ago, and now i'm not sorry for buying it. This game is made even for those PCs, which don't have extra settings, that's why it is something like CSS , where people can feel themselves quite free. The in-game atmosphere doesn't seem so nervous as you might think, but... it's better to steel yourself, that is my advice, chiefly if you play alone...

+ Good coop.
- There are a lot of mods (like in CSS), but i don't like them. That's just my personal attitude towards it.

+ Good music. It is awesome!
- Give more awesome music!

+ A pretty good warehouse - there are a lot of weapons, you can find everything.
- I would like to carry more, than 15 kg of extra weight.

My review for this game is positive because i liked it very much. For me it became a kind of a classic horror shooter, so don't be afraid to buy it.

10/10 Would balcony again

In terms of pure zombie killing, this game will offer a fine festival of carnage with a massive assortment of weapons and perks to mix and match. The challenge of fighting a horde of enhanced zombie creatures really shows once you attempt the higher difficulties. It's very easy to get surrounded and overwhelmed by the horde. But rather than rage quit, it feels a lot better to continue trying until you get it right.

However, if I may offer a slight demerit, leveling up perks can be a pain in the tuchus with more people. You end up being overshadowed by the higher-leveled players. If you want to enjoy the wondrous custom perks those guys at Guardians have made, well good fuckin' luck. Everybody's gonna pick the overpowered class and steal all the damage. And those servers that allow the default perks to level up to 60 or somewhere around there? Well, the maximum players on those servers reach up to 35 as far as I can tell, so the lower level players won't get a single point of damage on anything. Fuckin' imbalanced Sentries. On the offchance you can get a brief moment to yourself on one of these servers, good luck fighting a horde of uber custom zeds on Hard - Hell on Earth difficulty.

But, as I said, it's a minor stain on an otherwise-perfect killing game. And on the brighter side, if you're new to a Guardians or extended perk server and there are other, much higher leveled players, then all you have to do to even have a remotely good time is sit back and let them do ALLLL the work.

At first I thought that this was just a left 4 dead remix of sorts and i could'nt have been more wrong.  The basic gameplay is the same survive zombies but where it differs is the classes and huge variety of weapons and characters.  All the zeds serve a different purpuose on the field and though some are more dangerous than others they all pose a major threat in their own right.  Extremely fun i love the gameplay and all the custom maps and weapons from the workshop.  My only real complaint with the game is all the dlc being new weapons and characters, however i feel that the extra weapons although very powerful, do not make the game extremely easy and ruin the challenge factor of the game.  If you enjoy zombie games or arcade type shooters Killing Floor is the game for you.

Classic one-liners, smooth gunplay, a cathartic feeling every time a head pops, and a healthy amount of custom maps if you check the workshop. Basically an essential FPS on pc. Words of advice: use leveling maps to rank up; having higher levels will make purchasing weapons much easier. Also, never turn your back on a gorefast.

Lo recomiendo, excelemte si eres amante de los juegos FPS y COOP este es para ti, el juego es SOLO COOP, los gráficos son básicos, pero ni los notas cuando estas descabezando alguno de ellos :V o pasar unos momentos de adrenalina en las dificultades con tus amigos te hacen dar unas buenas risas.

Los controles nada diferente a otro FPS, WASD- ESPACIO- CLICK DERECHO - IZQUEIRDO- CENTRAL, mover mouse Arriba-Abajo-Izquierda-Derecha jajjajjaja Nac enserio los básicos así que nada de complique.

Algo que me gusta mucho es su modo Bullet Time que sucede en algunos momentos en el juego : D Recomendado : 8.0 de 10.

No es de lo mejor ni tampoco es de lo peor, Killing Floor es lo que buscas cuando estas aburrido: un juego divertido para pasar el rato pero no tan adictivo para clavarte mas de 2 horas jugandolo.
 El juego toma otro nivel de entretenimiento si lo juegas con amigos y garantizado que te dara momentos de risa. Sin embargo cabe recabar cosas que al cambiarlas podrian hacer de este titulo una mejor experiencia para los usuarios ya que la cantidad de armas es escasa (a menos que estes dispuesto a invertir un poco de pasta en ello) e inversamente proporcional a la cantidad de bugs que presenta.

Conclusion: Es el analogo de a lo que en la industria del cine se le llama "Pelicula Palomera" 100% recomendado si quieres una opcion rapida para acabar con el aburrimiento (Por un rato). 7/10
Best game ever!

This game is just non stop heartpounding action. You have an array of fun weapons to use.
The variety of the monsters is great and the patriarch will shred you to pieces. 
There are usually just 10 rounds but it varies depending on the map and other things.
The waves get harder but you use money to buy weapons from the trader after each round.
You have only about a minute to buy your weapons and body armor before the trader closes.
There are a select amount of classes from the sharpshooter to the support specialist.
Overall it's just a fun game when you're the last guy alive in a wave and everyone is
rooting for you to survive. Just give it a try if you're a fan of survival horrors. 10/10

This is kind of like the Insurgency of zed shooters.  Teamwork is key, learn the maps, know your class role, but also just have a good time.  If you don't like that kind of gaming, then this game isn't for you.  Otherwise, highly recommended, though the sequel is coming out soon.

限免的时候体验了一天多，然后就在打折的时候买了下来。总体来说，挺好玩的。但这游戏更加注重配合还有大无私的精神，而不是一味的个人突突突！当队友需要金钱来买枪支时，而自己又有多余的钱的时候，那就给其他人吧，一个团队不是你一个人强就行，而是你一个人强后要带动你身边的队友一起强起来，这才是游戏的真谛。当队友在前面清理怪物的时候，你要做的不是在后面看着，而是在身后保护队友背后的安全，怪不是朝一个方向来，而是多方向的。当团队背后不刷怪的时候，你要做的就不是保护队友的背部而是转而帮队友回复生命或者支援，优先决定你职业的取向！比如你是神枪手，那么就别把十字弩或者狙击枪的子弹浪费到小怪身上，放心，当队友经济有富裕的时候他会给你钱来补充弹药的。你要做的就是首要猎杀坦克、电锯男以及声波女（姑且这么叫吧 - - ）反正说到底就是每种职业都有强悍的一面，要善于利用这一面为队友提供帮助
